subAttributes.name: streetAddress
subAttributes.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information. This attribute may contain newlines.

subAttributes.name: locality
subAttributes.description: The city or locality component of the address.

subAttributes.name: region
subAttributes.description: The state or region component of the address.

subAttributes.name: postalCode
subAttributes.description: The zip code or postal code component of the address.

subAttributes.name: countryCode
subAttributes.description: The country name component. When specified, the value MUST be in ISO 3166-1 "alpha-2" code format [ISO3166]; e.g., the United States and Sweden are "US" and "SE", respectively.
